html:
3.14.20  3:49 am   any tips on getting such a professional sound with a home setup or is it in equipment and experience 

     it's all experience and experimentation. remember the golden rule: professionals are human, and so are you

3.14.20  2:53 am   Is your life happy?

     scientists are trying to figure out

3.14.20  2:14 am   What's an objectivizer and what is it at?

     never heard of it

3.14.20  1:45 am   what's the most musical fruit?

     grapes

3.14.20  1:05 am   I notice your reference going back home or reasons that you can't in a lot of your songs. Is that a theme you try to work on,

     absolutely not. i try to not do it

     and does it have and deeper meaning to you than just being another lyric?

     yes, it is combined with music. when you combine lyric and music, that's where the magic happens

3.14.20  12:50 am   Thoughts on linguistics?

     craziest thing since language

     it's the study of languages

3.14.20  12:25 am   This might be a stupid question but when writing a song do u come up with the title and then the lyrics or the lyrics first?

     hold on 1 minute, you said it's a song, so don't forget about the MUSIC, but yes occasionally sometimes it can be fun to do title first. other times the title will be absolutely last

      Or does it happen differently every time?

     it could. there are certainly enough ways for it to be different every time

3.14.20  12:14 am   How do you think about the implications?  

     with an implication buddy, you can take turns implying something and having the other person think about it

3.13.20  11:52 pm   Are you working n anything other than music and videos?

     i am specifically working on video making techniques

3.13.20  11:47 pm   What's your happiest memory?

     if i decided on 1, it would create a very sad illusion that all the rest were somehow less happy

3.13.20  11:45 pm   are you uploading on april 1st 2020?

     i think that is still way to soon for me to know how the fleck i'm supposed to do what i am doing

3.13.20  11:35 pm   bill how are babies made

     you have to combine 2 other babies

3.13.20  11:18 pm   what coding language do you recommend to learn

     quantum mechanics

3.13.20  11:00 pm   What is your favorite mathematical symbol?

     ≈

3.13.20  10:44 pm   Are you even human?

     oh that would explain a lot

3.13.20  10:43 pm   when will you come back home and make vids? :(

     i'm having a count down timer

3.13.20  10:32 pm   How do you decide when you cannot decide?

     not sure

3.13.20  10:27 pm   Does Friday the 13th scare you?

     no

3.13.20  10:25 pm   i cant commit to my own projects help

     you could try bringing in the military

3.13.20  10:02 pm   Do you like maps?

     yes

3.13.20  9:34 pm   Can you help Italy with Coronavirus, please?

     believe me i am doing everything i can. for now keep singing songs. make up some new ones! the best songs come from times like these

3.13.20  9:11 pm   how do you destroy earth

     i actually can't think of a way

3.13.20  9:07 pm   What's your favorite text case?
snake_case?
kebab-case?
camelCase?
Or a different one?

     that's not important, what i think matters here is that you have told me the names of 3 different types of cases, only 1 of which i had known before. which i suspect was your purpose all along

3.13.20  9:00 pm   how can you be so amazing

     i have some conspiracy theories about that

3.13.20  8:21 pm   What was the first ever homework you got?

     i think it was to take each word (from a provided list of words) and use each one in a sentence. i remember being completely paralyzed by this because i found myself completely unwilling to produce any bit of content that did not have at least some good reading value, and unfortunately at the time i didn't have enough writing experience nor workaround tricks to deliver to that standard

3.13.20  7:50 pm   do you feel like changkng your mind?

     yes

3.13.20  7:45 pm   How would you describe your profession

     hm, how about like this

3.13.20  7:42 pm   how cool is space

     i think you will see for yourself once you start moving around

3.13.20  7:39 pm   what are you doing currently?

     innovations

3.13.20  6:50 pm   the tempo and instruments that reinforce those tempos are like paper. melodies and instruments that reinforce them are like shapes, their texture/mood/aesthetic like shading. but how does crayon fit into this equation? What is the crayon of sound?

     it's you. i think that's quite obvious

     i hope this makes sense because if not I'm in for a WORLD of frustration

3.13.20  5:53 pm   thank you for letting me feel things i haven't in what seems like a long time. how are you able to accomplish this good sir?

     the whole trick is being a doctor and a patient at the same time

3.13.20  5:23 pm   What's the best instrument to learn after guitar? Not just in terms of similarity but what'll go with it best

     singing

3.13.20  5:19 pm   On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate all that exists?

     10

3.13.20  5:06 pm   you are awesome stay awesome

     holy cranberry factory you are a friendly person with friendship tactics

3.13.20  4:53 pm   how do i make myself start getting things done?

     the key is understanding the first step

3.13.20  4:51 pm   Should i get pizza for dinner tonight or should i stick to soup?

     just remember: you can always turn pizza into soup, but it is very difficult soup into pizza

3.13.20  4:49 pm   how do you, personally, see and use categories?

     total free for all. the categories can morph and change as fast as you can use them. but don't let that stop you from enjoying the surf

     for example, banana is a type of fruit, and huge is also a type of fruit, but are banana and huge both at the same level?

     absolutely, but check again tomorrow

3.13.20  4:28 pm   is 2020 delicious ?

     could be an acquired taste

3.13.20  4:26 pm   Do you still do anagrams to entertain yourself, even if you're not posting them on this website?

     yes but any i do are queued to be posted

3.13.20  4:19 pm   I feel such a deep connection with you through your music but I don't know you personally. Thank you for being so inspiring.

     holy ohiowa, you are very friendly

3.13.20  4:05 pm   Are you working on the cure for the Coronavirus?

     no, but i shall continue to work on cures for the existential conundrum

3.13.20  3:26 pm   What are your thoughts on clowns?

     more people are clowns than you think (and more clowns are people than you think)

     Also thank you for making wonderful and hilarious content :) you're great

     holy east westminster, you are very friendly

3.13.20  3:21 pm   do you eat air

     lord knows i have tried

3.13.20  3:17 pm   How do you view yourself?

     have to rely on reflections, which can be a little backwards sometimes

3.13.20  2:55 pm   Why did you create your channel, Did anyone tell you to do it

     yes

      or you just wanted to show clips of you singing?

     much much more than singing

3.13.20  2:30 pm   would you be so kind as to release more jazz instrumentals?

     yes

3.13.20  2:24 pm   What was the most bizarre internet trend? (In your opinion) 

     going online

3.13.20  2:20 pm   What's in the Reality section of your website

     selected edits of my ongoing documentation of my life and experiences

     and how does one assess it

     go to my website, and click to other categories until you see "reality", click on "reality" and when it says 'what's the password' click "i don't know". hm, wait i just realized you said "assess", not 'access', so in case you meant "assess", then i would say just watch a bunch of the videos and see what you think

3.13.20  2:08 pm   do you exist

     oh that would explain a lot

3.13.20  1:31 pm   how do i snowboard when all the snow is gone?

     hm, you might want to try skateboarding for now
